text:
I believe my purpose in
life is to show others

their immeasurable worth
through my actions.

Practically speaking,
what this means to me,

is that I really try
to love my family

well, to serve my friends,
and to advocate effectively

In my life so far, this
has taken, really, the form

But as I think about leaving
HBS and entering the workforce,

I realize that I will
have the opportunity

to do this at scale in my
teams, in my organizations,

and in any future communities
that I'm a part of.

So as I think about
my goals and what

I want to take away
from my experience here,

I really would like to look
back on this experience

and see that I had grown into
a more effective, strong,
